questions.text: When I hear music I love, I typically...
choices: Can't help but dance or move to it
Listen intently to the lyrics or melody
Feel it emotionally but stay still

questions.text: My morning routine works best with...
At a concert or live music event, I'm most likely...
choices: Front row, fully immersed in the experience
Dancing and singing with the crowd
Somewhere with a good view and sound
Enjoying the vibe from the back

questions.text: The lyrics I connect with most are about...
When working or focusing, I prefer...
choices: Familiar songs I can tune out
